answers.answer: awwww, I'm so sorry to hear that :(at first I thought it was affection b/c Princess and Jester always lick each other (mom and daughter)... question: My oldest cat, Toby, has been licking my younger ones face, causing bald areas and sores.  I do my best to keep them separated, but they like to sleep together.  Toby also likes to lick me a lot, but I don't let him because it hurts me.  He was diagnosed with diabetes last November and is currently receiving insulin injections twice daily.  When it does happen, I clean the licked area with water and then dry it thoroughly.  Although I tried putting antibiotic ointment on Harry's face (he's the younger cat that is being licked), of course that caused him to try to get it off, resulting in further irritation of the already tender area.  If anyone has any suggestions or opinions on why this is happening, or how to stop it, I'd really appreciate it, and so would Harry!
title: One cat licking fur off another's face
